title: GameStop Frenzy Favored Wall Street Over Investors
itunes:title: GameStop Frenzy Favored Wall Street Over Investors
description:
Wall Street Journal Columnist Spencer Jakab discusses his book “The Revolution That Wasn’t: GameStop, Reddit, and the Fleecing of Small Investors.”

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
